typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	parameter1 as string
}
source(output(
		{S.No} as string,
		Name as string,
		Value as integer,
		ratio as float
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	limit: 100,
	purgeFiles: true) ~> source1
source1 derive(calculated = Value*ratio) ~> inserttodb
inserttodb sink(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
